DirectPython 11 documentation¶

This is an alpha release, so some issues are to be expected.

  • Introduction
  • System requirements
  • Frequently asked questions

Visit the home page for the latest news and information.

For support, visit the forum. It is not very impressive, but for now it should do. You don’t have to register to post (unless it starts to fill with spam etc.).

To start exploring DirectPython 11, select the Sample Browser or View Samples from you start menu.
